name: Woosh! (The Duck)
description:
Woosh!

A little train sandbox made by Duckie and Tea Party Games

Features
  • Fully fledged rail editor with turns, intersections, and more
  • Mechanics that spice up the gameplay
Controls

Left Mouse Button - Place or rotate rails . (For straight rails place them while holding Shift.)

Right Mouse Button - Remove rails.

Toggle Auto off  at bottom right corner to place rails without automatically connecting them.

Signs

Toggling the Rail Signs at bottom left corner lets you place two signs which you can use only once:

Pressing 1 while your mouse is over on train track will place a stop sign which will stop train for 3 seconds on that track.

Pressing 2 while your mouse is over on train track will place a give way sign which will stop train if theres a train on next track and wait until the track is free.

Have fun! :D
